00032 class EffectNoise:public Effect {
00033 
00034  public:
00035    EffectNoise() {
00036        noiseType=0;
00037        noiseAmplitude=1.0;
00038    }
00039 
00040    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00041       return wxString(_("Noise..."));
00042    }
00043 
00044    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00045       std::set<wxString> result;
00046       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#GeneratorPlugin"));
00047       return result;
00048    }
00049 
00050    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00051       return wxString(wxT("Noise"));
00052    }
00053 
00054    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription() {
00055       return wxString::Format(_("Applied effect: Generate Noise, %.6lf seconds"), noiseDuration);
00056    }
00057 
00058    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00059       return wxString(_("Generating Noise"));
00060    }
00061 
00062    virtual int GetEffectFlags() {
00063       return BUILTIN_EFFECT | INSERT_EFFECT;
00064    }
00065 
00066    virtual bool PromptUser();
00067    virtual bool Process();
00068    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00069 
00070  private:
00071    sampleCount numSamples;
00072    double noiseDuration;
00073    int noiseType;
00074    double noiseAmplitude;
00075 
00076  protected:
00077    virtual bool MakeNoise(float *buffer, sampleCount len, float fs, float amplitude);
00078 
00079  // friendship ...
00080  friend class NoiseDialog;
00081 
00082 };
